snippet: The Fed proposes a rule to increase big banks’ capital requirements. | Wall Street seeks to reshape Dodd-Frank. | A near sweep in the government’s latest Bitcoin auction. | The co-founder of TheStreet is hit with his own insult.
abstract: The Fed proposes a rule to increase big banks’ capital requirements. | Wall Street seeks to reshape Dodd-Frank. | A near sweep in the government’s latest Bitcoin auction. | The co-founder of TheStreet is hit with his own insult.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: New Capital Rule for Big Banks
